name: Askwxbrad
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: The latest weather updates from First Warn Chief Meteorologist Brad Panovich. Otherwise known as wxbrad or weather Brad on-line. Get the personalized forecast each day right from Alexa.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
